name: Eat me if you can!
description:
IMPORTANT: GAMEPADS FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

Eat me if you can! is a 2 player game.

You shoot you toungue untill it hits something and can then leap to ut, during the leap you can eat the enemies on your way.

It's made in 6 hours for LudumDare 35.

Twitter: @PepijnWillekens

(Also possible to play with W-A-D and arrow keys (... but gamepad is much better!))
